_meanings:
{@--2@} To
depart, go forth, go away, set
forth or out; {#utkzipyEnAM jyotirekaM#}
{#jagAma#} <ls>Ś. 5. 30.</ls>

{@--5@} To
go to the state or condition of, 
become, undergo, suffer, partake of &c.
(usually joined with nouns 
ending in {#tA, --tva#} &c. or any noun in
the <ab>acc.</ab>); {#gamizyAmyupahAsyatAM#}  
<ls>R. 1. 3</ls>; {#paScAdumAKyAM sumuKI jagAma#}  

<ls>Ku. 1. 26</ls> went by or received the name
of Umā; so {#tfptiM gacCati#} becomes satis
fied; {#vizAdaM gataH#} became dejected;  
{#kopaM na gacCati#} does not become angry;
{#AnfRyaM gataH#} became released from
debt; {#manasA gam#} to think of, 
remember; <ls>Ku. 2. 63</ls>; {#vfzeRa gacCataH#} riding
a bull; <ls>Ku. 5. 80.</ls>

{@--4@} To signify, denote,
convey an idea or sense of; {#dvO naYO#}
{#prakftArTaM gamayataH#} ‘two negatives
make one affirmative.’
